title: Cara Delevingne and Phoebe Waller-Bridge peed in front of a McDonald's during wild night out
text:
One is a supermodel turned actress, and the other is a three-time Emmy-winning writer, director and actress.

Cara Delevingne and Phoebe Waller-Bridge have already become our favorite celebrity friendship.

Delevingne recently opened up about a wild night out they had, which ended with the pair peeing in front of a McDonald's.

Wild time: Cara Delevingne recently opened up about a wild night she had with Phoebe Waller-Bridge, which ended with the pair peeing in front of a McDonald's

The Suicide Squad star told Cosmopolitan UK: 'I was with her last week - I had a reunion with a lot of my English girlfriends and she came along and she’s one person there that no one knew, because she's my newest friend.'

But the girls night out quickly turned to a potential public indecency arrest, as she finished the story.

She added: 'I think me and Phoebe peed on the lawn outside of a drive-thru McDonald's.

'It was hysterical - we needed to pee so badly but we were on a party bus and we were like, "let's get out at McDonald's." They wouldn’t let us use the toilets so we just peed outside on the lawn outside it.'

Girls night: The Suicide Squad star told Cosmopolitan UK : 'I was with her last week - I had a reunion with a lot of my English girlfriends and she came along and she’s one person there that no one knew, because she's my newest friend'

Emergency: She added: 'We needed to pee so badly but we were on a party bus and we were like, "let's get out at McDonald's." They wouldn’t let us use the toilets so we just peed outside on the lawn outside it'

Total babe: Scandalous antics aside, Delevingne had only the best things to say about her new friend: 'Phoebe Waller-Bridge could be the Prime Minister. She's one of my really close friends. She's a babe'

Scandalous antics aside, Delevingne had only the best things to say about her new friend.

She of the Killing Eve creator: 'Phoebe Waller-Bridge could be the Prime Minister. She's one of my really close friends. She's a babe.'

Waller-Bridge recently took home her first three Emmy Awards for her show Fleabag, including Outstanding Comedy Series.

She also received an Outstanding Drama Series nomination for her show Killing Eve, starring Sandra Oh and Jodie Comer.

Meanwhile, Delevingne can be seen alongside Orlando Bloom in the Amazon Prime fantasy series Carnival Row.
description: Scandalous antics aside, Delevingne had only the best things to say about her new friend: 'Phoebe Waller-Bridge could be the Prime Minister. She's one of my really close friends. She's a babe.'
